scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build && npx wrangler pages dev ./dist --kv "img_url" --r2 "img_r2" --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --persist-to ./data
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.ci-test: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:8080 && mocha"
